overview: Before founding OpTier, Mr. Gal served as Chief Financial Officer of Memco Software. Prior to that, Mr. Gal served as CFO of publicly-traded Bogen Communications International (a telecommunications company), Aryt Industries and Reshef Technologies (both defense technology companies). Previously, Mr. Gal was a senior certified public accountant with Luboshitz, Kasirer & Co., an Israeli accounting firm. Mr. Gal holds a BA in economics from Ben Gurion University.
